name: Roguelike2023
description:
This is my first game with procedural environment generation.
 I didn't manage to do much of what I planned, I faced difficult obstacles due to my inexperience,  but the experience gained is worth it.  
I will finish the game. Many thanks to the organizers for the invaluable experience!  
Control: W, A, S, D - movement.  
"Space" or "Left Mouse" - hit.  
I apologize for the many mistakes and oversights. I will be very glad to your feedback.
